amount.description: The amount of exhaustion to apply to the player.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of exhaustion to apply to the player.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/exhaust)

Applies exhaustion to the entity, reducing saturation and hunger.

Type ID: `origins:exhaust`

!!! note

    **This entity action type will only work on players.**
